title: Case Logic SLDC-203 Compact System/Hybrid/Camcorder Kit Bag (Black)
description: The Case Logic SLDC-203 High Zoom Camera/Camcorder Case (Black) is a lightweight case, compatible with most High Zoom cameras and Camcorders. Features a molded EVA base for impact and moisture protection and adjustable neoprene floor allows for custom interior organization. Multiple storage pockets make it easy to carry all of your camera/camcorder accessories with ease. Removable shoulder strap included. 25 Year Warranty.
